const response = await client.indices.analyze({
  tokenizer: "standard",
  filter: [
    "lowercase",
    {
      type: "synonym_graph",
      synonyms: ["pc => personal computer", "computer, pc, laptop"],
    },
  ],
  text: "Check how PC synonyms work",
});
console.log(response);
